docs.lead_paragraph: T. Ludlow Chrystie, counsel for Mr. and Mrs. Edward Young Baker, applied to Supreme Court Justice Erlanger yesterday for a writ of mandamus directing the Board of Health to change the name on the records of their two-and-a-half-year-old son from Edward Young Baker to William Henry Baker. Decision was reserved.

headline.main: WANT BABY'S NAME CHANGED.; Parents Ask Court to Alter the Health Department Records.

docs.abstract: has left 2 wills; US will gives all to son
